sources.title: Highly Dangerous (1950)
sources.description: Dane Clark, Margaret Lockwood Written by Eric Ambler

metadata.Plot: When British Intelligence discovers that an Iron Curtain country is developing insects as weapons, they persuade eminent entomologist Frances Gray (Margaret Lockwood) to get into the country to collect some specimens. On arrival, her cover is almost immediately blown and her contact murdered. The future looks grim for her and also perhaps for the world.
metadata.Actors: Margaret Lockwood, Dane Clark, Marius Goring
